scripts.migrate: node -e "require('os').platform().startsWith('win') ? require('child_process').execSync('powershell ./scripts/migrate.ps1', {stdio:'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('./scripts/migrate.sh', {stdio:'inherit'})" && pnpm --filter @uptimematrix/store build && cd packages/store && npx prisma db seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev: pnpm run db:dev && pnpm run migrate && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.start: pnpm run db:prod && pnpm run migrate && turbo run dev --parallel
